body:
Ah, that is interesting behavior. Thanks for the additional information @route.

I'll see if I can't look a bit more into it in the next couple of days as well.

```
Loading development environment (Rails 4.0.0.beta1)
irb(main):001:0> topic = Topic.create name: "I like pie."
   (0.1ms)  begin transaction
  SQL (3.5ms)  INSERT INTO "topics" ("created_at", "name", "updated_at") VALUES (?, ?, ?)  [["created_at", Sat, 16 Mar 2013 23:01:24 UTC +00:00], ["name", "I like pie."], ["updated_at", Sat, 16 Mar 2013 23:01:24 UTC +00:00]]
   (1.7ms)  commit transaction
=> #<Topic id: 1, name: "I like pie.", created_at: "2013-03-16 23:01:24", updated_at: "2013-03-16 23:01:24">
irb(main):002:0> topic.update_attributes id: 15, name: "I like pie a lot!"
   (0.1ms)  begin transaction
  SQL (0.4ms)  UPDATE "topics" SET "name" = ?, "updated_at" = ? WHERE "topics"."id" = 15  [["name", "I like pie a lot!"], ["updated_at", Sat, 16 Mar 2013 23:01:40 UTC +00:00]]
   (0.1ms)  commit transaction
=> true
irb(main):003:0> topic
=> #<Topic id: 15, name: "I like pie a lot!", created_at: "2013-03-16 23:01:24", updated_at: "2013-03-16 23:01:40">
irb(main):004:0> topic.reload
  Topic Load (0.4ms)  SELECT "topics".* FROM "topics" WHERE "topics"."id" = ? LIMIT 1  [["id", 15]]
ActiveRecord::RecordNotFound: Couldn't find Topic with id=15
```
